Class ArtGallery

  • java.lang.Object
    • ArtGallery
  • public class ArtGallery
extends java.lang.Object
    This class models the Artwork Gallery implemented as a binary search tree. The search criteria include the year of creation of the artwork, the name of the artwork and its cost.
    Author:
    Tanay Nagar, Gaurav Chopra

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private BSTNode<Artwork> root  
      private int size

      Recursive helper method to buy artwork given the name, year and cost.

      Gets the recent best Artwork in this BST (meaning the largest artwork in this gallery)
      protected static Artwork getSuccessor​(BSTNode<Artwork> node)
      Helper method to find the successor of a node while performing a delete operation (buyArtwork) The successor is defined as the smallest key in the right subtree.
      int height()
      Computes and returns the height of this BST, counting the number of NODES from root to the deepest leaf.
      protected static int heightHelper​(BSTNode<Artwork> current)
      Recursive helper method that computes the height of the subtree rooted at current counting the number of nodes and NOT the number of edges from current to the deepest leaf

      Checks whether this binary search tree (BST) is empty

        public ArtGallery()

    • Method Detail

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Checks whether this binary search tree (BST) is empty
        Returns:
        true if this ArtworkGallery is empty, false otherwise

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns the number of artwork pieces stored in this BST.
        Returns:
        the size of this ArtworkGallery

      • lookup

        public boolean lookup​(java.lang.String name,
                      int year,
                      double cost)
        Checks whether this ArtworkGallery contains a Artwork given its name, year, and cost.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the Artwork to search
        year - year of creation of the Artwork to search
        cost - cost of the Artwork to search
        Returns:
        true if there is a match with this Artwork in this BST, and false otherwise

      • lookupHelper

        protected static boolean lookupHelper​(Artwork target,
                                      BSTNode<Artwork> current)
        Recursive helper method to search whether there is a match with a given Artwork in the subtree rooted at current
        Parameters:
        target - a reference to a Artwork we are searching for a match in the BST rooted at current.
        current - "root" of the subtree we are checking whether it contains a match to target.
        Returns:
        true if match found and false otherwise

      • addArtwork

        public boolean addArtwork​(Artwork newArtwork)
                   throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Adds a new artwork piece to this ArtworkGallery
        Parameters:
        newArtwork - a new Artwork to add to this BST (gallery of artworks).
        Returns:
        true if the newArtwork was successfully added to this gallery, and returns false if there is a match with this Artwork already stored in gallery.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if newArtwork is null

      • addArtworkHelper

        protected static boolean addArtworkHelper​(Artwork newArtwork,
                                          BSTNode<Artwork> current)
        Recursive helper method to add a new Artwork to an ArtworkGallery rooted at current.
        Parameters:
        current - The "root" of the subtree we are inserting new Artwork into.
        newArtwork - The Artwork to be added to a BST rooted at current.
        Returns:
        true if the newArtwork was successfully added to this ArtworkGallery, false if a match with newArtwork is already present in the subtree rooted at current.

      • getBestArtwork

        public Artwork getBestArtwork()
        Gets the recent best Artwork in this BST (meaning the largest artwork in this gallery)
        Returns:
        the best (largest) Artwork (the most recent, highest cost artwork) in this ArtworkGallery, and null if this tree is empty.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a String representation of all the artwork stored within this BST in the increasing order of year, separated by a newline "\n". For instance

        "[(Name: Stars, Artist1) (Year: 1988) (Cost: $300.0)]" + "\n" + "[(Name: Sky, Artist1) (Year: 2003) (Cost: $550.0)]" + "\n"

        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a String representation of all the artwork stored within this BST sorted in an increasing order with respect to the result of Artwork.compareTo() method (year, cost, name). Returns an empty string "" if this BST is empty.

      • toStringHelper

        protected static java.lang.String toStringHelper​(BSTNode<Artwork> current)
        Recursive helper method which returns a String representation of the BST rooted at current. An example of the String representation of the contents of a ArtworkGallery is provided in the description of the above toString() method.
        Parameters:
        current - reference to the current Artwork within this BST (root of a subtree)
        Returns:
        a String representation of all the artworks stored in the sub-tree rooted at current in increasing order with respect to the result of Artwork.compareTo() method (year, cost, name). Returns an empty String "" if current is null.

      • height

        public int height()
        Computes and returns the height of this BST, counting the number of NODES from root to the deepest leaf.
        Returns:
        the height of this Binary Search Tree

      • heightHelper

        protected static int heightHelper​(BSTNode<Artwork> current)
        Recursive helper method that computes the height of the subtree rooted at current counting the number of nodes and NOT the number of edges from current to the deepest leaf
        Parameters:
        current - pointer to the current BSTNode within a ArtworkGallery (root of a subtree)
        Returns:
        height of the subtree rooted at current

      • lookupAll

        public java.util.ArrayList<Artwork> lookupAll​(int year,
                                              double cost)
        Search for all artwork objects created on a given year and have a maximum cost value.
        Parameters:
        year - creation year of artwork
        cost - the maximum cost we would like to search for a artwork
        Returns:
        a list of all the artwork objects whose year equals our lookup year key and maximum cost. If no artwork satisfies the lookup query, this method returns an empty arraylist

      • lookupAllHelper

        protected static java.util.ArrayList<Artwork> lookupAllHelper​(int year,
                                                              double cost,
                                                              BSTNode<Artwork> current)
        Recursive helper method to lookup the list of artworks given their year of creation and a maximum value of cost
        Parameters:
        year - the year we would like to search for a artwork
        cost - the maximum cost we would like to search for a artwork
        current - "root" of the subtree we are looking for a match to find within it.
        Returns:
        a list of all the artwork objects whose year equals our lookup year key and maximum cost stored in the subtree rooted at current. If no artwork satisfies the lookup query, this method returns an empty arraylist

      • buyArtwork

        public void buyArtwork​(java.lang.String name,
                       int year,
                       double cost)
        Buy an artwork with the specified name, year and cost. In terms of BST operation, this is equivalent to finding the specific node and deleting it from the tree
        Parameters:
        name - name of the artwork, artist
        year - creation year of artwork
        cost - cost of the artwork being added
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - with a descriptive error message if there is no Artwork found with the buying criteria

      • buyArtworkHelper

        protected static BSTNode<Artwork> buyArtworkHelper​(Artwork target,
                                                   BSTNode<Artwork> current)
        Recursive helper method to buy artwork given the name, year and cost. In terms of BST operation, this is equivalent to finding the specific node and deleting it from the tree
        Parameters:
        target - a reference to a Artwork we are searching to remove in the BST rooted at current.
        current - "root" of the subtree we are checking whether it contains a match to target.
        Returns:
        the new "root" of the subtree we are checking after trying to remove target
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - with a descriptive error message if there is no Artwork found with the buying criteria in the BST rooted at current

      • getSuccessor

        protected static Artwork getSuccessor​(BSTNode<Artwork> node)
        Helper method to find the successor of a node while performing a delete operation (buyArtwork) The successor is defined as the smallest key in the right subtree. We assume by default that node is not null
        Parameters:
        node - node whose successor is to be found in the tree
        Returns:
        return the key of the successor node
